main event: A bright white light object surrounded by an orange glow was observed moving in short spurts off the east coast of Florida.
interesting points: The object appeared larger as it moved to the northeast and changed colors from orange to white or gray., The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes., The observer was on the destroyer U.S.S. Manley when the sighting occurred., The object was estimated to be flying at 25,000 feet., The observer speculated that it might have been a meteorite passing at low altitude.
sighted object: a bright white light object surrounded by an orange glow
witness description: The observer was a 19-year-old male student stationed on the destroyer U.S.S. Manley.
